text:
Has anyone tried had success using the `fromjson` filter in Programmable Email modules? It's returning null when using it on a custom property that is a JSON string. I'm wanting to convert the JSON string (e.g., `contact.quiz_results`) into an object that I can work with in HubL.

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Issue-with-fromjson-Filter-on-Nested-Objects-in-Programmable/m-p/939425|Same issue as this thread>

<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YH119N2/p1694093214156539|But this individual appeared to get it working>

I was trying to get this working in a <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/specify-drag-and-drop-areas-in-a-custom-email-template|custom DND template> (which is also in beta) which I think was the problem. Using a regular DND template is now working :tada:
